newsitem.title: INDIA: India to disclose chemicals weapons stockpile.
newsitem.headline: India to disclose chemicals weapons stockpile.

text.p: India was scheduled to unveil details of its chemicals weapon stockpile for the first time on Thursday and open it for inspection, officials said.
"It is a deadline which India has managed to fulfill," a government spokesman told Reuters.

Indian Express daily reported that a parliamentary committee of lawmakers was briefed by officials on Wednesday of India's decision taken to implement the Chemicals Weapons Convention (CWC), which New Delhi ratified last September.
Under the convention, a deadline was set for June 26 to disclose the inventories.
India is at the chair of the Executive Council of the CWC.
The disclosure will be made at The Hague.
